Browne (April 26, 1929 - July 23, 1993) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe

A mụrụ ya na Laurel, Florida, a maara Browne nke ọma màkà i
Vivianse mkpesa ya nke ndị Africa na America, na ijikọ abstraction na okike
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya, bụrụ ónyé na-eme ihe ike, prọfesọ na onye guzobere ọtụtụ gallery
Dị ka nne ya si kwuo, Browne nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 64 site na ọrịa kansa afọ.
Vivian Browne was born in Laurel, Florida, on April 26, 1929. She spent most of her life in New York City and Kern County, California
She received her Bachelor of Science in 1950 from Hunter College, New York, NY and a Master of Fine Arts from Hunter College in 1959
Her early painting career was fostered by a scholarship from the New School for Social Research, and a Huntington Hartford Foundation fellowship in 1964 and a fellowship with the MacDowell Colony.
O tinyere ego na njem ya gafee Europe na Africa, ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1972
Browne rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum Rutgers dị na Newark site na 1971 ruo 1992 dị ka ónyé otu ngalaba nke ngalaba nka na sayensị ka ọ na-aga n'ihu dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya na ihe ngosi gafee mba ahụ.

Browne nwèrè ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ya na SoHo 20 Gallery n'oge ndụ ya, yana ihe ngosi na Bronx Museum, Mahadum California, Santa Cruz na Mahadum Western Michigan. O gosikwara na oghere MoMA PS1 na Clocktower Gallery na 1986.
Vivian Browne bụ ónyé natara ọtụtụ onyinye n'oge ndụ ya niile.
